page.title: 17THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND
page.content: The{vicar of Effingham and Bookham } has held this post for 4 years.The {vicar of East Horsley}has been vicar for 8.5 years.Effingham church was built in the fifteenth century and is covered in the local stone which is flint.The Horsley church is over 950 years old. The{services}start at 9.30 in the morning.They are on Wednesdays and Sundays for Effingham and Sundays in Horsley. Both churches have a regular {attendance.}The vicar of East Horsley says he would like to see more young families at the church.He also feels that more{social and leisure } {facilities}would greatly benefit the area.He would welcome any newcomers to the area and encourages them to come to his services.
